mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(proj_no) FROM kk_project WHERE proj_id=#{projId}

SELECT p.proj_no, p.proj_title, p.proj_fm, p.proj_quantity, p.proj_goals, p.proj_delivery, p.proj_end, f.fun_no, f.fun_quantity, f.fun_fm, f.fun_track, f.fun_date, f.fun_address, f.fun_detail, m.mem_name, m.mem_phone FROM (SELECT * FROM kk_funding WHERE fun_proj=#{projNo} ORDER BY fun_track ASC, fun_no ASC) f JOIN kk_project p ON(f.fun_proj = p.proj_no AND p.proj_id=#{loginId}) JOIN kk_member m ON(f.fun_id=m.mem_id)
